name: Swiftwick Pursuit Hike Four Ultralight Cushion Hike Socks - Unisex
categories: Pursuit Hike Four Ultralight Cushion Socks
description: Ultralight performance socks to keep your feet dry and comfortable while you bag peaks or pursue your trail goals.Merino and synthetic fabric blend balances thermoregulation, moisture management and durability.Quarter height protects ankle from trail debris.Seamless toe for chafe-free comfort.Ultralight cushioning keeps feet comfortable without adding bulk.
